metadata.title: Data Scientist - Data Analysis User Stories

user_stories.title: Automated Data Exploration
user_stories.story: As a data analyst, I want automated data exploration that can generate insights, correlations, and patterns so that I can quickly understand new datasets.
acceptance_criteria: Detect patterns and trends in data

user_stories.title: Interactive Dashboard Creation
user_stories.story: As a BI analyst, I want automated dashboard creation that can generate interactive visualizations and reports so that I can present insights to stakeholders effectively.

user_stories.title: Predictive Analytics Pipeline
user_stories.story: As a data scientist, I want a predictive analytics pipeline that can forecast trends and outcomes so that I can provide actionable insights to business stakeholders.

user_stories.title: Data Storytelling Automation
user_stories.story: As a data storyteller, I want automated data storytelling that can create narrative reports and presentations so that I can communicate insights effectively to non-technical audiences.

user_stories.title: Real-time Data Monitoring
user_stories.story: As a data engineer, I want real-time data monitoring that can track data quality, performance, and anomalies so that I can ensure reliable data pipelines.
acceptance_criteria: Track data quality metrics in real-time
Alert on data anomalies and issues
